attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: palm oil plantations are killing 1000's of animals each year and it is bothering loads of people. 90percent of orangutans have decreased in the past 100 years and they will be extinct in the wild in 20 years time. these apes are one of the closest living relitives we have and we're killing them. Think about the animals and not just you self.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
